content: Someone who does moderation might want to take a look at https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/81996. I think it would benefit from being locked until a T-lang decision has been reached. The mahkoh user keeps adding more passive aggressive comments.

imvho, I don't see /right now/ the need to lock the conversation. I think it's still in technical territory, although I perceive a bit of animosity, but that could be to a language barrier (maybe on my end). I think I don't see personal attacks or trolling or other reasons to lock the issue
(please correct me if my POV is incorrect)

That seems accurate to me, which is why I did not message the mods myself, but it is a good idea to make sure issue does not escalate by e.g. reminding people to keep discussion civilized. Somebody from the moderation team is best suited for this as they have been dealing with these issues forever now. But it is also entirely up to them to interpret and enforce whatever policies and cocs we have.
